description: Periodically audit resource groups in the cloud management console to ensure that only expected items exist, especially close to the top of the hierarchy (e.g., AWS accounts and Azure subscriptions). Typically, top-level accounts (such as the AWS management account) should not contain any workloads or resources.(Citation: AWS Management Account Best Practices)

external_references.description: AWS. (n.d.). Best practices for the management account. Retrieved October 16, 2024.
